name: The Pizza Head (Full Game)
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and Android

*** STORY ***

Coming home after a long day of work, you feel tired and hungry, so you will order a pizza, but instead of eating it, you will fall asleep...  Late at night, you wake up from a terrible nightmare in which you met a monster named "The Pizza Head"... And suddenly you discover that this monster is in the house with you.

Strange things start happening...Uncover the horrifying truth behind the Pizza Head…

Thank you everyone for the lovely comments and reactions!

Would you kindly consider following us 

          

Like what we do and want to support the games? Then please consider either donating here on Itch :)

WSAD:  Walk

Space  Bar : Click, Take 

Alt: Flashlight

Shift: Speed walk

E : Close 

Esc : Setting
